participant_1.background:

I go for long walks with my dog and explore new places.
i live in alabama.

i love children.

On rainy days, I love to look at my collection of cycling-related items and think about my father.
I am passionate about being a good dog parent to my collie.

content.text: I like going for long walks with my dog and exploring new places. I love to meet new people and learn about their life. Do you have any pets?
I have a collie named Bear and I love him very much. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's a great dog and I love going on walks with him.
Dogs are amazing companions. I love going for walks with my dog too.
Do you like any music?
I love Guns and Roses. They're my favorite band.
I love Guns and Roses too! I'm going to see them in concert next month.
Me too! I'm so excited.
What do you like to do on rainy days?
I like to look at my collection of cycling-related items and think about my father.
That sounds nice. I like to read on rainy days.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to go dancing, but I'm not sure if my parents would approve.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
I'm afraid I'd be too embarrassed.
There's no need to be embarrassed. Everyone is welcome at dance classes.
I'll think about it.
You should. It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome.
